comment: If you ve walked away from God and have found yourself entangled by this world know this , it s not too late to reconcile your relationship with God . Repent and the Lord Jesus Christ will cleanse you and not condemn you . Don t keep putting Him off , come home while you still can !
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (r / reconcile-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (r2 / relation-03
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG2 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "God"))))
                  :ARG2 (l / late)
                  :ARG3 (t / too))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (w / walk-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :direction (a2 / away)
                        :source p)
                  :op2 (f / find-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (e / entangle-01
                              :ARG0 (w2 / world
                                    :mod (t2 / this))
                              :ARG1 y))))
      :snt2 (a3 / and

                  :ARG0 (a4 / and

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Repent"))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Lord"
                                    :op2 "Jesus"
                                    :op3 "Christ")))
                  :ARG1 y)
            :op2 (c2 / condemn-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 a4
                  :ARG1 y))
      :snt3 (c3 / come-01
            :mode imperative
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)
            :ARG4 (h3 / home)
            :time (p4 / possible-01
                  :mod (s / still))
            :ARG1-of p4))

comment: For Many Would Rather Be Entangled By This World ... Because That's What They See Physically ... Faith Allows You To Hope For Things Not Physically Seen By Those Who've No Faith ... One Shouldn't Take Any Great Joy In The Knowledge Of Them Perishing ...

comment: I understand and one should never rejoice in anyone s suffering thus the reason I was encouraging them to turn back.This post is regarding those who were once walking w / God and backslid from Him.There s many reasons why one turns away but my prayer is that they will come back
